# Tienda Pizza - Pizza Rush

> Official pages for the mobile-first pizza business game in Mexican Spanish.

## Primary page
- https://tiendapizza.com/

## SEO landing pages
- https://tiendapizza.com/juego-de-pizzeria-gratis.html
- https://tiendapizza.com/simulador-de-negocio-de-pizza.html
- https://tiendapizza.com/juego-de-pizza-para-celular.html
- https://tiendapizza.com/faq-juego-de-pizzeria.html

## Short summary
Pizza Rush is a free pizza business game for mobile. Core loop: cook pizzas, serve zone-based orders, invest in advertising, and expand to multiple branches.

## Supported language
- es-MX
